Description: On I-95 at mile marker 79 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 266.3 in the City of Hampton, near Lasalle Avenue, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage
